snippet: Three people were killed and two others critically wounded in shootings in a residential cul-de-sac in south Kansas City on Tuesday afternoon.
abstract: Three people are killed and two others critically wounded in shootings in a residential cul-de-sac in south Kansas City, Mo, and police are searching for an SUV missing from the scene.
lead_paragraph: Three people were killed and two others critically wounded in shootings in a residential cul-de-sac in south Kansas City on Tuesday afternoon.

headline.main: Missouri: Shooter Sought in Three Killings
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Shooter Sought in Three Killings
